name: Battery Collector
description:
A bit about the project

A battery collecting game I made for a school project.

For the course we had to follow a tutorial on YouTube to use C++ in Unreal Engine 4. Then after getting everything like in the tutorial series we had to continue the project and add our own pieces to it.

CONTROLS

Move with WASD keys.

Space to jump.

Move mouse to look around

Quick Guide

Collect the energy crystals to win.

Lookout for the enemies that eat your energy. 

Avoid the mushrooms.

Credits

A .pdf file for the credits of used assets is inside the game folder.
